subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tom Glavine pitched five and two-thirds effective innings to earn his first win for Atlanta in six years, and the Braves held on for an 8-6 victory against the host Philadelphia Phillies on Wednesday night.
snippet: Tom Glavine pitched five and two-thirds effective innings to earn his first win for Atlanta in six years, and the Braves held on for an 8-6 victory against the host Philadelphia Phillies on Wednesday night.
